caption.title: GM volume reduction in autoimmune LE patients (whole-brain VBM).

fn.p: Contrast: controls > patients; covariates: age, sex, scan source (MAP, OPTIMA), and TIV. Clusters are FWE-corrected at peak-voxel level (p<0.05) over an individual voxel threshold of p<0.001 (unc.); voxel size: 1 mm3 isotropic; spatial smoothing kernel: 4 mm FWHM; FWHM: Full-width at half-maximum; HPC: hippocampus; kE: cluster size (number of voxels; minimum cluster size: 50 voxels); L: Left hemisphere; mm: millimeter; MAP: Memory and Amnesia Project; OPTIMA: Oxford Project To Investigate Memory and Aging; R: Right hemisphere; TIV: total intracranial volume; x, y, z: coordinates in mm.
